name: oblivion-extension
description: Shape the web you use every day - intelligent element removal with memory and AI assistance

scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-css && npm run copy-html && npm run copy-workers && npm run copy-icons
scripts.copy-css: mkdir -p dist/assets dist/popup dist/options && cp src/assets/critical.css dist/assets/ && cp src/popup/*.css dist/popup/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/options/*.css dist/options/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy-html: mkdir -p dist/popup dist/options && cp src/popup/*.html dist/popup/ && cp src/options/*.html dist/options/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run build:watch
scripts.package: npm run build && zip -r oblivion-v2.0.0.zip dist manifest.json icons README.md

author: Oblivion Team
